name: Apparatus-74
description:
This game was created during Trijam #74. 

The development time: 2:55

---

This game is about breaking the code. Make sure you have your 🎧 on. This game relies heavily on sound. And don't give up if you can't get it at first. Try to experiment, listen... click... hold... drag maybe? 

Once solved, each widget will go green and show you the next number of the whole code.

It was supposed to have much more widgets there, but unfortunately, this is as much as I was able to squeeze in in 3 hours. Maybe for a future update. 😊
